speaker: President. −
english: President. − I should like to reassure Mrs Pack that the Chair’s acknowledgements are a proper and institutional token of respect for rapporteurs and the opinions that they express, even when we are completely at odds with their content.
original: President. − I should like to reassure Mrs Pack that the Chair’s acknowledgements are a proper and institutional token of respect for rapporteurs and the opinions that they express, even when we are completely at odds with their content.
agenda_item: Adult learning: It is never too late to learn (debate)
